title: 73/296. International Day Commemorating the Victims of Acts of Violence Based on Religion or Belief

paragraphs.1: Decides to designate 22 August as the International Day Commemorating the Victims of Acts of Violence Based on Religion or Belief;
paragraphs.3: Requests the Secretary-General to bring the present resolution to the attention of all Member States, the organizations of the United Nations system and civil society organizations for appropriate observance.
